post:
WebSound is a premium, affordable UK based hosting provider serving many hundreds of customers since our launch back in 2013. Check out what we have to offer below!

All Web/Reseller Hosting plans include:
* SSD RAID 10 Hard Drives
* UK Location
* DDoS Protected
* LetsEncrypt for free SSL Certificates
* LiteSpeed including LSCache
* CloudFlare Integration
* CloudLinux, CageFS, PHP Selector
* Softaculous
* Free redundant AnyCast DNS
* Unmetered MySQL Databases, Email Accounts, Parked Addon and Sub Domains
* cPanel/WHM Control Panel
* 99.9% Uptime Guaranteed
* 14 Day Money Back Guarantee

**Mini Package:**
1. 5GB SSD Disk Space
2. Unmetered Bandwidth
Available for £4.97 ($6.15) per year with promotional code OUIBN055AM
[Click here to order!](https://websound.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=156&billingcycle=annually&promocode=OUIBN055AM "Click here to order!")

[**View full Web Hosting packages**](https://websound.co.uk/webhosting "View full Web Hosting packages")

**RESELLER1 Package:**
1. 25GB SSD Disk Space
2. Unmetered Bandwidth
3. 25 cPanel Accounts
Available for £5.20 ($6.43) monthly with promotional code RCGQ15U23V
[Click here to order!](https://websound.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=160&promocode=RCGQ15U23V "Click here to order!")
